question: Who acted in the most movies?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
RETURN p.name, COUNT(m) AS movieCount
ORDER BY movieCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Which movies released between 1990 and 2000 have more than 5000 votes?
cypher: MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.released >= 1990 AND m.released <= 2000 AND m.votes > 5000 RETURN m.title, m.released, m.votes

question: Who has the longest name among all actors?
cypher: MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(:Movie) RETURN p.name AS name ORDER BY size(p.name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Who was born in 1965 and has directed a movie?
List the movies with a title starting with "The"
cypher: MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.title STARTS WITH "The" RETURN m.title

question: How many movies did Tom Hanks appear in?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Tom Hanks"})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
RETURN count(m) AS numberOfMovies
